snippet.title: King's Quest: Ch. 1 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
www.sierra.com/kingsquest/

An aging King Graham reflects on a life of adventure with his granddaughter, Gwendolyn, taking players back to his teen years and his quest to become a knight of Daventry in King Edward’s royal guard. Discover a wondrous world full of whimsical characters, charming puzzles and perilous dangers in this fun and enchanting coming of age story. #KingsQuest  For more information, please visit www.sierra.com.
